post_detail.description:
Challenge: 
ClickFire Media was tasked by the Martin Agency to develop an iphone and Android app for their client, GEICO. 
Execution: 
The new Brostache app allows iphone, Android and ipad users to "see" how they would look with a mustache. The Brostache app includes three different mustaches to choose from as well as full shareability with Facebook and Twitter. The app was also fully integrated into a GEICO TV commercial centered around people doing dumb things with their smartphones.
Results: 
More than 3 million downloads 
Ranked #9 in the entertainment category of the app store 
Ranked in the top #72 in the app store
post_detail.title: GEICO Brostache App
